value.title: First Look: Delta, TSA Launch Facial Recognition At Atlanta Airport
value.excerpt: The next step in airport automation has become a reality, just in time for the holidays. Delta Airlines, the Transportation Security Administration (TSA), and a travel tech company called Pangiam have partnered up to bring facial recognition technology to the Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL).
